scripts.build:debug: esbuild src/core/main.ts --bundle --outfile=public/index.js --platform=browser --target=es2020 --log-level=info && mkdirp ./build && cp -r public ./build && cp node_modules/@tensorflow/tfjs-backend-wasm/dist/*.wasm build/public && bls-sdk-ts build ./index.ts -o ./build -f debug.wasm
scripts.build:release: esbuild src/core/main.ts --bundle --outfile=public/index.js && mkdirp ./build && cp -r public ./build && bls-sdk-ts build ./index.ts -o ./build -f release.wasm
